import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import GraphQLFetch from "../Helpers/GraphQLFetch" function Students() { const [students, setStudents] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetchStudents() }, []) fetchStudents() async function fetchStudents() { let res = await GraphQLFetch(`{ studets{ reg_no name school{ name code } } }`) setStudents(res) } return (

Add Students

Name registartion-number school code
) } export default Students
